subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Through rules changes, stricter enforcement, and player fines and suspensions, the N.F.L. in recent years has sought to remove the most extreme violence from an inherently violent sport.
snippet: Through rules changes, stricter enforcement, and player fines and suspensions, the N.F.L. in recent years has sought to remove the most extreme violence from an inherently violent sport.
